overview: Charles Martin has more than 15 years of experience as a leader in the design, development, and implementation of enterprise products and projects for The Hartford, Travelers, Met Life, AIG, Cisco Systems, PSINet, M&T Bank, First Data Corp, and Sara Lee. As part of BCF Technology, he co-architected TransactNOW and developed other applications to connect carriers to distribution channels, utilizing web services and maintaining ACORD compliance. At Vertafore, he served as Director of Product Development, Agency and Carrier Markets, improving software, delivery, and cost-effectiveness.
